title: what this lovely rounded font?
content:
thank you!!

 [‹ Editor & Art Director Zine Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123054731/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47458 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please help me find this font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123054731/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47448 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Hibell

comments.content: Could be Simple by lineto, but the “a” doesn’t match.

yeah i checked that one too.

Very close.
It looks like another case of [T-Star Mono Round](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123054731/http:/www.gestalten.com/fonts/detail/?id=402881820693de75010693debc1600d3).
